apis.description: Retrieve the content of the front page

operations.notes: Retrieve the content of the front page

parameters.name: course_id
parameters.description: ID

apis.description: Retrieve the content of the front page

operations.notes: Retrieve the content of the front page

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: ID

apis.description: Update the title or contents of the front page

operations.notes: Update the title or contents of the front page

parameters.name: course_id
parameters.description: ID

parameters.name: wiki_page[title]
parameters.description: The title for the new page. NOTE: changing a page's title will change its url. The updated url will be returned in the result.

parameters.name: wiki_page[body]
parameters.description: The content for the new page.

parameters.name: wiki_page[hide_from_students]
parameters.description: Whether the page should be hidden from students. *Note:* when draft state is enabled, attempts to set +hide_from_students+ will be ignored and the value returned will always be the inverse of the +published+ value.

parameters.name: wiki_page[editing_roles]
parameters.description: Which user roles are allowed to edit this page. Any combination of these roles is allowed (separated by commas). "teachers":: Allows editing by teachers in the course. "students":: Allows editing by students in the course. "members":: For group wikis, allows editing by members of the group. "public":: Allows editing by any user.

parameters.name: wiki_page[notify_of_update]
parameters.description: Whether participants should be notified when this page changes.

parameters.name: wiki_page[published]
parameters.description: Whether the page is published (true) or draft state (false). *Note:* when draft state is disabled, attempts to set +published+ will be ignored and the value returned will always be the inverse of the +hide_from_students+ value.

apis.description: List the wiki pages associated with a course or group

operations.notes: List the wiki pages associated with a course or group

parameters.name: course_id
parameters.description: ID

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort results by this field.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: The sorting order. Defaults to 'asc'.

parameters.name: search_term
parameters.description: The partial title of the pages to match and return.

parameters.name: published
parameters.description: If true, include only published paqes. If false, exclude published pages. If not present, do not filter on published status.

apis.description: List the wiki pages associated with a course or group

operations.notes: List the wiki pages associated with a course or group

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: ID

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort results by this field.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: The sorting order. Defaults to 'asc'.

parameters.name: search_term
parameters.description: The partial title of the pages to match and return.

parameters.name: published
parameters.description: If true, include only published paqes. If false, exclude published pages. If not present, do not filter on published status.
